Links:
Full-time to  
        224.02000 (W0IA) at Boulder, Lee Hill, CO .

Coverage: Wyoming border in the north, to Monument Hill in the south, near Colorado Springs. Its coverage is primarily to the east of the Front Range of the Rockies as the repeater signal is blocked to the west by the even higher Rocky Mountain peaks with altitudes of over 14,000 feet.

Wyoming border in the north, to Monument Hill (near Colorado Springs) in the south. Coverage is primarily to the east of the Rockies Front Range, as the repeater signal is blocked to the west by mountain peaks with altitudes of over 14,000 feet.

Coverage: Along the foothills and into Boulder where the 94 repeater is shadowed.

Colorado WX: Daily at 06:30. 
RMRL: Mod at 20:30. 
Astronomy: Tue at 19:00. 
Amateur Radio Events: Tue at 20:00.

Coverage: Wide area: Cheyenne, Wyoming to the north, Monument, Colorado to the south, Limon, Colorado to the east, and the continental divide to the west.
Links: Full-time to the  Colorado Connection System .
Notes: Split tone.  The repeater still transmits 123.0 for those wishing to use tone squelch, you must run a split tone 88.5 TX and 123.0 RX
Nets:
Colorado Traffic Net: Daily at 19:30. 
Colorado Connection Net (all welcome): Thu at 20:00. 
Statewide ARES: Sun at 20:00.

Affiliate: Boulder County Amateur Radio Emergency Service

Commands:
TS 1, CC 2: TG 3171 - Northern Colorado Network, TG 3100 - DCI Bridge, TG 1776 - USA Network, TG 310 - Tac 310.  

TS 2, CC 2: TG 2 - Local
Nets: Tac 310 Net, Sundays 18:00 Mountain Time, TS1, TG 310.

Links:
Linkable to  
        224.74000 (N0POH) at Golden, Guy Hill, CO .

Coverage: Great coverage of the Denver area and I-76 East to Atwood MM112. I-70 East to Agate MM340. West to Idaho Springs MM240. And I-25 from Larkspur MM172 to Longmont MM240 depending on the hills.

Commands: Any Brandmeister talk group is available on time slot 1, too many to list here, see website. https://dmrx.net/files/US_BM_User_Guide.pdf.  TG's are PTT enabled and will timeout after 15 minutes of inactivity.  Time Slot 2 Talk Group 310805 is local repeater only.
